# OIIAI Code - VS Code Extension

This is a VS Code extension project that provides a custom webview panel.

## Project Structure
- `src/extension.ts` - Extension entry point
- `src/panelViewProvider.ts` - WebviewViewProvider for the custom panel
- `package.json` - Extension manifest with contribution points

## Development
- Run `npm install` to install dependencies
- Run `npm run compile` to build
- Press F5 to launch Extension Development Host
